Docs.summary: Enumerates the levels of isolated storage scope that are supported by .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use IsolatedStorageScope to specify a degree of scope for an isolated store. You can specify combinations of these levels that are supported by <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how the IsolatedStorageScope enumeration is used in the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.GetStore%2A> methods.
